name: Harvest Horse
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Harvester's Stampede (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Moves up to its speed in a straight line and can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. The first time the harvest horse enters a creature's space during this move that creature must make a DC 12 Dex save. On a failure it takes 7 (2d6) slashing damage and is knocked prone. On a success it takes half damage and isn't knocked prone. When the harvest horse moves in this way it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Beast of Burden
special_abilities.desc: Is considered one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Poor Traversal
special_abilities.desc: Must spend two additional feet of movement to move through difficult terrain instead of one additional foot.
